pr_title: Port Batch common test project and jbatch_fat to open-liberty

timeline.message:
Port batch test.dbservlet and jbatch_fat projects to open-liberty
  -Moves com.ibm.ws.jbatch.test.dbservlet project to com.ibm.ws.jbatch.common_fat
  -Moves com.ibm.ws.jbatch_fat to com.ibm.ws.jbatch.open_fat
  -Adds gradle targets to common_fat that build app archives
  -Adds app utility class to common_util that shrinkwraps and hot-deploy app archives
  -Adds gradle targets to open_fat to import sources and app archives from common_fat
  -Modifies all open_fat tests to hot-deploy app archives
  -Repeats jbatch.open_fat for ee9, only
Post-code-review changes for port of Batch FATs
